synopsis.text: Giga Genos, a formidable invasion fleet, threatens the very existence of the galaxy! In a desperate bid to save their universe, Cacao and Parfait embark on a mission through the vast expanse of time and space. Their objective: to locate the legendary Fourth Warrior, known as Lamunes or Ramunes, the Galaxy's Champion. However, the duo's hopes are shattered when they discover that the mighty warrior they sought is commanding the invading forces, intent on subjugating the entire galaxy under his iron rule. As worlds crumble under his tyranny, Cacao, Parfait, and a plucky orphan find themselves as the galaxy's last line of defense against its once-greatest hero. The stage is set for an epic battle to determine the fate of the cosmos!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
